title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
- Press 'Add' for the associated editors.
- Multiple selection could be enabled.
- The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).
- Need a width hint for the dialog.
- The File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same.
OB:
a. Clicking 'Add' adds a hidden entry.
f. The dialog should have a width hint.
g. The File editors Pref page grows in height when selected.
EB:
a. Clicking 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.
d. Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
f. The dialog should have a width hint.
g. Only the File editors Pref page should grow in height when selected.
SR:
1. Go to the 'Workbench' preference page.
2. Select 'File Editors' under 'Workbench'.
3. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors', go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
4. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' and press 'OK'.

Expected result: The selected external editor should not be added as a hidden entry when 'OK' is pressed.
